name: No One Sneaks Forever
description:
Made for the UE4 2020 Spring Jam

You have stumbled upon a place you don't remember. You remember nothing, you know nothing. Except the deepest desire of your heart: Murder.

Chase down and backstab guards before they do it to you. You aren't safe except for brief moments. Use your abilities wisely and consider your surroundings before making a move. A single mistake can be crucial to your plans.

Please note that this game is technically a mod for a larger project. It has been heavily cut down to fit in the 1 GB file limit and isn't representative of gameplay in said project.
